nodes.text: Verpel was a Human male. In 3 BBY, he attended a ceremony at the Imperial embassy on Etti IV. There he met Elli Stark, the daughter of Iaco Stark, and despite being married, started harassing her. The two were then interrupted by a man named Jahan Cross, an Imperial Agent who posed as Elli's fiancé, which forced Verpel to leave her alone.
